QuestData.Title: Nursing the Wounds
QuestData.Description: I know why Mayla sent you. But as you have seen, the drogbar are not the only threat to Highmountain.$b$bI will not send forces to support until we deal with the minions of High Crawliac.$b$bIf you want to help, find my shaman. He was supposed to be dispersing these fires that are ravaging my village.$b$bHe was last seen heading for his spirit lodge to the south just before these Cinderwitches descended on us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Windmaster Julan and help extinguish the fires on Skyhorn.
QuestData.CompletionText: These harpies are all over the place!
QuestData.RewardText: Julan is dead? He was a good shaman and full of life. Not as morbid as some of these spiritwalkers.$b$bI will miss his laughter tonight.
